author: David1971
title: It's a chef minifig, that's what it is.
review:
This is a bag with a chef minifig in it. I got mine in the restaurant at Hotel Legoland (Billund, Denmark). It's a perfectly nice chef minifig!

The bag seems to suggest that you may also get a surprise fruit -- one of those shown on the packet. But you don't.

Nevertheless, a free minifig is a good thing.
